attributes.action: Do ask that all broadband speeds provided by the same provider of the same size be equal payment for all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am Paying  £25.00 a month for my broadband,i cannot see my bill as they have never sent me a pin # to do so.NEW customers are being charged £ 20.00 for the same broadband speed of
10MB,i ask that this government or Oftel Make it a fair and equal payment
for all broadband speeds,of the same size ie £25.00 or £20.00 for 10mB,so long as they are provided by the same provider.
